text: René Gary Wayne Bourque (born December 10, 1981 in Lac La Biche, Alberta) is a former Canadian ice hockey left winger. He played in the NHL for the Chicago Blackhawks, Calgary Flames, Montreal Canadiens, and Columbus Blue Jackets. == Awards == *He was named to the AJHL All-Rookie Team in the 1999–00 AJHL season. *He won the Dudley "Red" Garrett Memorial Award in the 2004–05 AHL season. *He was named to the AHL All-Rookie Team in the 2004–05 AHL season. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Calgary Flames players Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:First Nations people Category:Hamilton Bulldogs (AHL) players Category:Ice hockey people from Alberta Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Norfolk Admirals players
title: René Bourque
